title: Regulations and that is due to expire at any time within the period commencing
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Property Services (Regulation)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Property Services (Regulation) 

Act 2011 (Section 95) (Extension of Licences) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited property service (regulation) act 2011 (section 95) (extension licences) regulation 2020

title: Regulations and that is due to expire at any time within the period commencing
heading: 2. A licence that is in force on the coming into operation of these
text_raw:
2. A licence that is in force on the coming into operation of these 
Regulations and that is due to expire at any time within the period commencing 
on that coming into operation and ending on 31 August 2020 shall remain in 
force for a further period of four months commencing on the date on which the 
licence was otherwise due to expire. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th May, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Justice and Equality consents to the making of the foregoing 
Regulations. 

[162] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Justice 
and Equality. 
7 May, 2020. 

CHARLES FLANAGAN, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Given under the seal of the Property Services Regulatory 
Authority, 
7 May, 2020. 

MAEVE HOGAN, 

Chief Executive, Property Services Regulatory Authority. 

GERALDINE CLARKE, 
 Chairperson, Property Services Regulatory Authority. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [162]

title: Regulations and that is due to expire at any time within the period commencing
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations provide for an extension of four months of licences expiring 
within the period commencing on the coming into operation of the Regulations 
(i.e. the date on which the Regulations are signed and sealed by the Property 
Services Regulatory Authority) and ending on 31 August 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [162] 5
